resources.string: Web Content Display Screenlet: Shows the HTML of a web content given its articleId.
User Portrait Screenlet: Shows the user\'s portrait picture. Can fetch the user portrait from the userId or the portraitId.
Signup Screenlet: Signup form to register a new user in Liferay Portal
Asset List Screenlet: Shows a list of assets. Please choose an asset type to show all its entries
Login Screenlet: Shows a login form. Supports email, username and userId authentication
Forgot Password Screenlet: Shows a form to ask for a new password, using an email address or the username
DDL List Screenlet: Shows a list of DDL records of a specific recordSetId
DDL Form Screenlet: Shows a DDLRecord form. Allows file uploading and all DDL fields.
Asset List Screenlet: Shows a list of assets of a specific className
List of all the screenlets supported on version 1.0.0 of Liferay Screens
